title: Qualcomm - Hey Mitroms
description: Qualcomm is seeking motivated individuals for the position of Associate Engineer across multiple locations in India. This opportunity is open to recent graduates and early-career professionals with a background in Computer Science, Electronics, Electrical Engineering, or related disciplines. Successful applicants will contribute to cutting-edge semiconductor and wireless technology development in a collaborative, innovation-driven environment.

title: **Adobe** - Hey Mitroms
description: Adobe is seeking motivated individuals for the Non-Tech Intern BS position, ideal for recent graduates interested in contributing to world-class digital experiences. Interns will join a culture focused on innovation, inclusivity, and personal growth, working alongside talented professionals in a dynamic corporate environment.

title: IBM - Hey Mitroms
description: Company: IBM Research India

title: Rolls-Royce - Hey Mitroms
description: Rolls-Royce is inviting applications for the role of Intern – Data Analytics & Automation at its Pune office, specifically for students from the 2025 graduating class. This internship is tailored for individuals pursuing a Bachelor’s or Master’s in Engineering—specializations accepted include Mechanical, Computer Science, Electrical, or Electronics. The program provides an opportunity to contribute to advanced analytical and automation projects within a global engineering organization renowned for its innovation and industry leadership.

title: Philips Internship 2025: Paid Internship for Engineering and Science Graduates – Apply Now!
description: Philips, a leader in health technology and innovation, has opened applications for its 2025 Internship Program. This program offers highly motivated students and recent graduates a real opportunity to contribute to innovation and technology at the company’s Pune R&D center.

title: Cisco Off Campus Drive 2025: Software Test Engineer (Entry Level) – Bangalore
description: Cisco, a world leader in networking and digital transformation, is inviting applications from recent engineering graduates for their Software Test Engineer (Entry Level) position. Freshers and early-career engineers have the opportunity to join a global team, work on advanced technology, and jumpstart their professional journey.

title: Okta Off Campus Drive 2025: Associate Technical Support Engineer – Freshers Apply Now!
description: Are you a recent Computer Science graduate aspiring to launch your career at a global leader in identity and access management? Okta’s Off Campus Drive 2025 presents a fantastic opportunity for fresh talent to join their team as an Associate Technical Support Engineer in Bangalore. This role offers continuous learning, mentorship, and the chance to make a real impact supporting enterprise customers.

title: Capgemini Exceller 2025-26: Software Engineer Recruitment for Fresh Graduates
description: Capgemini, a renowned worldwide provider of IT consulting, digital, and cloud services, has announced its Exceller 2025-26 Hiring Program — a unique career launchpad for India’s new generation of engineering graduates. This drive aims to recruit outstanding freshers for key Software Engineer roles across PAN India, shaping the next wave of technology talent.

title: Hey Mitroms
description: Are you a graduate looking to launch your technology career at a global giant? Qualcomm’s Off Campus Drive 2025 offers the perfect launchpad for both software and hardware enthusiasts. With a worldwide reputation for driving wireless, mobile, and AI innovation, Qualcomm unlocks opportunities for fresh talent via its promising Associate Engineer positions. This detailed guide gives you all you need to know about eligibility, job roles, salary, and how to apply for Qualcomm’s latest Off Campus Drive.

title: Google Apprenticeship 2025 – Software Application Development
description: Google is seeking enthusiastic graduates for its Software Application Development Apprenticeship, starting March 2026 across Bengaluru, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, and Mumbai. This unique program offers hands-on experience, technical training, and mentorship to help launch your career in software development.

title: Salesforce Internship 2025 – Information Security Intern
description: Salesforce, a global leader in CRM and cloud solutions, is offering an exciting Information Security Internship for final-year graduates in Computer Science or Information Technology. This internship is designed for students eager to build a career in cybersecurity and develop hands-on skills in a leading tech company.

title: Amazon SDE-I Recruitment 2025
description: Amazon’s engineering teams power some of the largest distributed systems and cloud platforms in the world. As an SDE-I in Bengaluru, you will be part of a collaborative group that builds efficient, scalable solutions for millions of customers. The work environment is fast-paced, supportive, and driven by a culture of invention.

title: Capgemini Off Campus Drive 2025
description: Capgemini has announced its Off Campus Drive 2025 to hire Network Engineers for the Gurgaon location. This opportunity is open exclusively to B.Tech/BE (CSIT/Circuit branches) and MCA graduates from the 2025 batch. Freshers who meet the eligibility criteria can apply before the deadline.

title: HCLTech Off Campus Drive 2025
description: HCLTech is inviting applications from fresh engineering graduates for the role of Graduate Engineer Trainee. This opportunity is open to candidates from the 2025 batch with specializations in CSE, IT, EEE, ECE, or EIE.

title: Salesforce Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Salesforce, the world leader in AI-powered CRM, is conducting its Off-Campus Drive 2025 to hire freshers for the Software Engineering AMTS role. This is an excellent opportunity for passionate and skilled graduates to start their career with a globally renowned organization and work on cutting-edge technologies.

title: Capgemini Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Capgemini is hiring freshers for the Contact Support Group (CSG) role at their Noida location. This opportunity is open for 2025 batch graduates or diploma holders.

title: Cognizant Off Campus Drive 2025 – Trainee Job
description: Cognizant is a leading multinational professional services company, recognized globally for its expertise in digital transformation, consulting, and IT services. Headquartered in the United States, the company partners with clients across industries to innovate and improve business efficiency. Cognizant is also listed among the Forbes World’s Best Employers 2024 and continues to be one of the most admired organizations worldwide. The company values diversity and ensures equal opportunities for all applicants regardless of race, gender, religion, disability, or background.

title: Capgemini Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, technology services, and digital transformation. With over 350,000 employees in more than 50 countries, Capgemini is committed to innovation and helping clients succeed in the digital age.

title: Simens Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Simens is a global leader in digital payments and financial technology, providing secure, reliable solutions that empower businesses and consumers across over 200 countries. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, Simens enables seamless payment experiences worldwide.

title: Visa Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Visa is a global leader in digital payments, enabling secure transactions in more than 200 countries. Through innovation and advanced technology, Visa connects consumers, businesses, and governments, ensuring seamless and reliable payment experiences worldwide.

title: Walmart Off Campus Drive 2025 - Hey Mitroms
description: Walmart is a multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores worldwide.
